author: marvin
msg: Add support for param lists to Lemon-based parser.
Additionally, add support for several scalar constants: string literals, float
literals, hex literals, true, false and NULL.

author: marvin
msg: Make it possible to change a CFCParamList object to be variadic after
construction.  This make sense because the object isn't immutable anyway: we
add params one at a time already.

author: erans
msg: Added a test method that uses "PerfTestUtils" to do the benchmark.

author: marvin
msg: Rerun Flex if Lemon file changes.  This is necessary because under Lemon, the
lexer calls the parser rather than the other way around (as with yacc).  Also

author: mikemccand
msg: LUCENE-3520: fix test failure: call SIS.getVersion directly to avoid possible ACE if we are closed while being reopened
